name: The Adventures of Beanman
description:
Play as Beanman and punch your way through 20 unique bosses. Fight in unique worlds, like the Wild West, the Frozen Artic and more in order to save Beanland from the "Other World".

Beanman is 3d fighter focused on boss battles. You can use different items and powerups to help you beat the bosses. It uses cartoonish graphics similar to Gang Beasts and TABS.

Features:
Fight 20 challenging bosses.
Explore 20 worlds from the Artic to the Moon to other dimensions.
Use items and powerups around each world to help you with the fight.
